"A.P.241/10/2": "I know you're busy, but having you as my partner... I'm extremely grateful!"
"When I last met you, I am sorry that all I've asked was about your combat experience."
"But thanks to that, it's finally authorized! The new class I was studying!"
"Just now, information has been sent to the Class Counter. You can now register as a Hero now!"
"Now, since my class has been approved, I can become a Hero!"
"Oh that's right! I forgot to tell <%me> last time!"
"The new class that I was studying and was recently approved... It's called Hero!"
"Huh, is it a strange name? I mean, I think that it's..."

"LOOK, WE CAN USE SWORDS! DON'T
YOU THINK THAT'S VERY COOL?"

"TWIN MACHINEGUNS TOO! IF YOU
SWITCH TO HERO, YOU CAN USE
THESE NEW WEAPONS!"

"OH AND WE HAVE A UNIQUE WAY OF
USING A TALIS TOO!"

"AND IT'S ALL COVERED BY ONE CLASS!
ISN'T IT GREAT!?"
